trends: Rising concerns over data sovereignty laws
competitor_insights: Microsoft Azure dominates market share with 33%, followed by Amazon AWS at 22%.
Vendors offering specialized AI cloud solutions are gaining traction.
supply_chain_risks: High dependency on semiconductor manufacturing (chip shortages remain a risk).
regulatory_changes: EU's Digital Services Act imposes new compliance rules for cloud providers.

trends: Zero Trust Architecture becoming industry standard
Rise of AI-powered threat detection solutions
competitor_insights: Palo Alto Networks, CrowdStrike, and Fortinet are top competitors.
Emerging startups are challenging established firms with more cost-effective solutions.
supply_chain_risks: Shortage of cybersecurity talent leading to increased outsourcing.
regulatory_changes: New data protection laws in the US and EU are tightening security requirements.
